Resource.item: The category you are trying to delete contains subcategories. Do you want to continue?
Choose an action to perform on the subcategories
There are {num} tickets currently assigned to the category you want to delete.
Choose an action to perform on the subcategories
All the categories you want to delete will be reassigned to an existent single category.
Select, for every category you are up to delete, a destination category.
Subcategories will not be deleted and will be moved to the superior level.

All categories will be immediately deleted.
By choosing this option you will have to reassign the external tickets.
Cancel current operation and go to the categories reordering page.
All tickets will be assigned to a single, existent category.
For every category you want to delete, you will have to choose a category to replace the previous one.
Close wizard and refresh category list
Close wizard and refresh category list
Reassigned to a different category, due to deletion.
Please, choose a category to reassign.
Please, choose a category to reassign.
